title: Adlai Stevenson III
deleted: Born in Chicago, he received a law degree in 1957 from [[Harvard Law School]]. Stevenson was commissioned as a lieutenant in the U.S. Marine Corps in 1952, and served in the Korean War. He was discharged in 1954, but continued to serve in the Marine Reserves until 1961 as a captain. In 1957, Stevenson went to work as a clerk for a Justice of the Illinois Supreme Court and worked there until 1958 when he joined the law firm of Brown and Platt.
